title: Crypto Flow Report June 2025: Market Reset Amid Geopolitical Tensions
summary: June saw crypto markets trade without directional conviction as BTC briefly touched $110k but retreated to $107k, while ETH fell from $2,800 to $2,400 despite ETF approvals. The month was characterized by flattening volatility, defensive option positioning, and notable perpetual futures liquidations exceeding $500M, marking a reset from May's trend breakout.

title: Presto Research Services Overview
summary: Presto Research offers various crypto market analysis services including Daily Market Briefs, Trade Ideas, Crypto Focus reports, and Interview Series with Web3 founders. The research is distributed via email and Telegram, with weekly summaries provided on Saturdays.
